60 GlobalMPISession::GlobalMPISession( int* argc, char*** argv, std::ostream *out )
61 {
62  std::ostringstream oss;
63 
64  // Above is used to create all output before sending to *out to avoid
65  // jumbled parallel output between processors
66 
67 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
68  // initialize MPI
69  int mpiHasBeenStarted = 0, mpierr = 0;
70  MPI_Initialized(&mpiHasBeenStarted);
71  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PRINT(
72  mpiHasBeenStarted, std::runtime_error
73  ,"Error, you can only call this constructor once!"
74  ,out
75  );
76 
77  mpierr = ::MPI_Init (argc, (char ***) argv);
78  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PRINT(
79  mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error
80  ,"Error code=" << mpierr << " detected in GlobalMPISession::GlobalMPISession(argc,argv)"
81  ,out
82  );
83 
84  initialize(out); // Get NProc_ and rank_
85 
86  int nameLen;
87  char procName[MPI_MAX_PROCESSOR_NAME];
88  mpierr = ::MPI_Get_processor_name(procName,&nameLen);
89  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PRINT(
90  mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error
91  ,"Error code=" << mpierr << " detected in MPI_Get_processor_name()"
92  ,out
93  );
94 
95  oss << "Teuchos::GlobalMPISession::GlobalMPISession(): started processor with name "
96  << procName << " and rank " << rank_ << "!" << std::endl;
97 
98 #else
99  oss << "Teuchos::GlobalMPISession::GlobalMPISession(): started serial run" << std::endl;
100 #endif
101 #ifndef TEUCHOS_SUPPRESS_PROC_STARTUP_BANNER
102  // See if we should suppress the startup banner
103  bool printStartupBanner = true;
104  const std::string suppress_option("--teuchos-suppress-startup-banner");
105  for( int opt_i = 0; opt_i < *argc; ++opt_i ) {
106  if( suppress_option == (*argv)[opt_i] ) {
107  // We are suppressing the output!
108  printStartupBanner = false;
109  // Remove this option!
110  // Note that (*argv)[*argc]==0 but convention so we copy it too!
111  for( int i = opt_i; i < *argc; ++i )
112  (*argv)[i] = (*argv)[i+1];
113  --*argc;
114  }
115  }
116  if( out && printStartupBanner )
117  *out << oss.str() << std::flush;
118 #endif
119 }

121 GlobalMPISession::~GlobalMPISession()
122 {
123  haveMPIState_ = false;
124  mpiIsFinalized_ = true;
125 #ifdef HAVE_MPI

127  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PRINT(
128  mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error
129  ,"Error code=" << mpierr << " detected in MPI_Finalize()"
130  ,&std::cerr
131  );
132 #endif
133 }

161 void GlobalMPISession::initialize( std::ostream *out )
162 {
163 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
164 
165  if(mpiIsFinalized_) {
166  // MPI has aleady been finalized so we have a serial machine again!
167  rank_ = 0;
168  nProc_ = 1;
169  return;
170  }
171 
172  if(haveMPIState_)
173  return; // We already have what we need!
174 
175  // We don't have the state of MPI so the constructor for this class must not
176  // have been called. However, if MPI has been called in another way we
177  // can still get the state of MPI_COMM_WORLD here.
178 
179  int mpiHasBeenStarted = 0, mpierr = 0;
180  MPI_Initialized(&mpiHasBeenStarted);
181 
182  if(!mpiHasBeenStarted)
183  return; // We have to give up and just leave NProc_ and rank_ at the default values.
184 
185  // Get the state of MPI
186 
187  mpierr = ::MPI_Comm_rank( MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank_ );
188  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PRINT(
189  mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error
190  ,"Error code=" << mpierr << " detected in MPI_Comm_rank()"
191  ,out
192  );
193 
194  mpierr = ::MPI_Comm_size( MPI_COMM_WORLD, &nProc_ );
195  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION_PRINT(
196  mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error
197  ,"Error code=" << mpierr << " detected in MPI_Comm_size()"
198  ,out
199  );
200 
201  haveMPIState_ = true;
202  mpiIsFinalized_ = false;
203 
204 #endif // HAVE_MPI
205 
206 }
207
